page.title: 02LEISURE
page.content: The{Deepings Leisure Centre}was finished in January 1976 and it now employs eleven full-time and forty part-time staff. The Centre is the biggest building in the Deepings area and it has a wide variety of sports and leisure facilities for disabled and able-bodied people. It is also used for meetings and social functions. Local schools make good use of the Centre during the day. At other times it is used mostly by those people in their late teens and early thirties,although younger members use it a lot for swimming and skating. There are also lots of other indoor activities. During 1984-85 the Centre cost Â£314,300 to run.Part of this amount is met by the County Council and the rest by membership fees.
